description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile MSM8996, MSM8939, MSM8976, MSM8917, SDM845, and SDM660, access control collision vulnerability when accessing the replay protected memory block.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: MSM8996, MSM8939, MSM8976, MSM8917, SDM845, SDM660
